## Data loading {.smaller}

```{python}
import pandas as pd
df = pd.read_csv('smoker.csv')
df
```

## Histogram

### Single variable

```{python}
df['smoker'].hist()
```

### All variables

```{python}
df.hist();
```

## Data loading

```{python}
import pandas as pd
df = pd.read_csv('customer_data.csv')
df
```

## Line chart

### One Variable

```{python}
df['Age'].plot()
```

### All Variables

```{python}
df.plot();
```

### All Variables, log scale for y axis

```{python}
df.plot(logy = True)
```

## Scatter plot

### Two variables

### Method 1

```{python}
df.plot(kind='scatter', x = 'Income', y = 'Age')
```

### Method 2

```{python}
df.plot.scatter(x = 'Income', y = 'Age')
```
